sub_title: Intensives voor vernieuwers, schrijver van De sjamaan en de manager
summary:
Life presents us with an ocean of possibilities. I am here for change makers that want to dive deep in this ocean to explore the depths of their potential. 

My own exploration started a few decades ago when I decided to study 'psychology'. It was a fascinating, rational, scientific approach of the human being. I was marinated in knowledge and analytic models of reality and knew how to share them with managers and organizations. I became a skilled trainer consultant with my own company that was specialized in managerial transformation on the job. Then the question popped up..'is this true?' , 'am I really helping all those people and organizations and myself?'  The voice of my heart was very clear...it said 'no, you have to dive deeper.' 

I left my company and house and completed a shamanic training as medicine man in the native American tradition in the deserts of Utah.  After finishing my training I have guided many ceremonies and have learned to move between layers of consciousness. With Sara Hermanides I started 'In the Heart of Change' where we offer ceremonies and masterclasses about awakening and grounding consciousness. And even after all of the wonderful impact of the ceremonies that I have witnessed I saw myself confronted with the central question again...'Is this true?' and again I had to dive deeper. From my head to my heart to my ... gut. 

I have grounded my experiences and now it's time to share insights and take responsibility for what I know. I love to bridge the gap between ancient wisdom and modern knowledge. To help us remember the wisdom that comes naturally to us. That's why I write books and songs and share my thoughts as a public speaker/performer and share ancient wisdom through masterclasses on the internet. 

If you want to follow me check out www.intheheartofchange.com,  there is a magazine called 'Wolf' on our site with free content. I hope that we will inspire you.

profile_positions.description: Wij bieden intensives en ontwikkeltrajecten voor mensen met diepgang. De combinatie van 'zakelijkheid' en 'spiritualiteit' die we meebrengen is tegelijkertijd magisch en ook confronterend. Ik gids anderen en mijzelf naar puur bewustzijn, een plek van totale verantwoordelijkheid waar je niet meer kan duiken voor wat je al weet. Check www.intheheartofchange.com voor ons aanbod.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Gespecialiseerd in leiderschapstraining en begeleiding op de werkplek. Veel grote organisaties hebben geprofiteerd van de originele en praktische werkvormen waarmee leiders werden gestimuleerd om te ontwikkelen. Als directeur was ik verantwoordelijk voor scouting, productontwikkeling en sales.


January 1997- December 2010
KLM Cargo/KLM Baggage Services/ KLM Catering Inflight/ KLM Engineering and Maintenance/ KLM Passenger Services/ KLM Ground Services.
Verhogen van de kwaliteit van leidinggeven via diverse leiderschapsprogramma's.

2000-2004
Ministerie van Buitenlandse Zaken
Verhogen van klantgerichtheid van visa afdelingen op Ambassades: China, Japan, Ghana, Turkey, Surinam, Morocco, Nigeria, Vietnam, Thailand, England, San Marino, Hungary, Bulgaria, Russia, Poland.  

2005-2010
School for Politie Leiderschap (SPL)
Out of the Box; programma's om toekomstige strategische leiders te leren kijken vanuit meerdere perspectieven.

Frisse Feedback; on the job ontwikkelprogramma voor strategische beslissers.

2008-2010
MSD
Transitie Proces, verbeteren van leiderschap via on the job benadering.

Andere opdrachtgevers:
PvdA, Blijf Groep, Sykes, Volksbond, Gemeente Amsterdam, Ministerie van Binnenlandse Zaken, 
The activities of Goedbloed Leiderschap&Organisatie are transferred to FreeQ www.freeq.com
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
January 2002 – January 2010 (8 years 1 month)

Selltop is a high end commercial management game that is developped for KLM, Unilever and Corus to enhance commercial awareness of leaders. In 2010 the activities of this company were transferred to Vergouw Consulting. The Selltop game is a very motivating commercial tailor made training that has been succesfully executed in more than 30 countries around the globe.The game is a perfect match between the world of numbers and the world of people. 

KLM 		Selltop Passenger Services
			Selltop Cargo
              		Selltop Inflight Services
                        Selltop 2B Captain

Corus	       The Steel game: introducing trainees in the steel market                       

Unilever	First Mover game: introducing strategic leaders of the 
                        future to new realities. Helping them deal with 
                        uncertainty and look for drivers of change.
profile_positions.title: Owner
